snippet: Bubba Watson holed out with a 7-iron for eagle and tied the course record with a nine-under-par 63 to build a two-shot lead after three rounds at the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas.
abstract: Bubba Watson takes third round lead at Hero World Challenge golf tournament; other golf new noted.
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson holed out with a 7-iron for eagle and tied the course record with a nine-under-par 63 to build a two-shot lead after three rounds at the Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas.
